item.title: Scooby Doo Theme Song Ukulele Play Along (In A)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of A.
Chords Used: A, Bm, E, D, D#
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/R-w5qnNS0Uo
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6
We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Bruno Mars - The Lazy Song
item.description:
The Lazy Song by Bruno Mars. It’s been lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber gizmothing1, I digitally lowered the recording so you can play it without a capo and added the ukulele chord diagrams. The original lyric video may be found here - https://youtu.be/k1_26Iayp1s . For educational use. Chords Used: G C D B7 Am Bm Em
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Mama Cass - Dream A Little Dream Of Me
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Dream A Little Dream Of Me - The Mamas & The Paps Music by Fabian Andre and Wilbur Schwandt and lyrics by Gus Kahn
Using the chords: A A7 Bm B7 C E7 F Fm F#m G7 Ab
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU D DU or DU DU DU DU
This is not an easy play along but with lots of practice it is very playable and devinitely worth the work.
This video is meant for educational purposes and ukulele lessons.
No copyright infringement intended.

item.title: Christopher Davis-Shannon - Don't Call Me Honey
item.description:
For educational use. For GCEA Ukulele. Key of F, a whole step higher than the original version.
Chords Used: F, F7, Bb, Bbm6, C7, D7, G7, Bdim7, E7, A7, Bm
As performed by Christopher Davis-Shannon. Special thanks to him, as he gave me permission to use this song and also provided help with the chords shown . Incidentally, he plays the song "in C" but on a ukulele tuned up a minor third (i.e. Eb).
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE):
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Now United - All Day
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Bm (Transposed down a half step from the original).
Chords Used: G, A, F#m, Bm
As performed by Now United.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/tZEklY1fgdQ
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Motion background from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Memory from "Cats" - Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: A, F-sharp minor, D, C-sharp minor, Bm, E, F#, B, F, Dm, Bb, Am, G, C, Em (Starts in the key of A, ends in the key of C).
Memory from the musical “Cats” by Andrew Lloyd Webber. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. I just added chords to the lyric video created by YouTuber Miyanoe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for CGEA ukulele. Keys of F and A.
Chords Used: F, Dm, Gm, C7, F7, Bb, Bbm,, C+, A, F#m, Bm, E7, G, Eb, C#7, Bdim7, Dm7
Original performance by George Harrison
[Corrected Version from the Original Upload]
Our local ukulele group is working on this song, and I was asked to check out the chords they are using (and the tablature they are using), and I made a play along video (there is no tablature in this song).
Do you enjoy these videos? If so, please click on the tutorial video and subscribe to the sister channel to this channel. This channel will feature only video play alongs, and the sister channel will feature all of my original content.
Tutorial Video (History, GCEA chords, & strumming) on the sister channel (please subscribe!): https://youtu.be/8bll9-iQLW8
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The baritone ukulele chord font is from ukefarm.com.
The Motion background video is from motionbolt.com
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!

item.title: Time for a Tune Up (The Joy of Gone) Ukulele Play Along
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Dm & D.
Chords Used: Dm, C, Gm, A, A7, D, Bm, G
As featured on the Bagster Bag Commercial: https://youtu.be/MpBQBs-ggjg
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/3zTfJvlVu8o

item.title: Madness - It Must Be Love
item.description:
Ukulele play along
It Must Be Love - Madness Written by Labi Siffre
Using the chords: Am A7 Bm C D Dm D7 Em E7 G (Some chords have been simplified for teaching purposes) Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU (island strum)
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
